message: I'm starting with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
Not bad, but I can do better!
You're not getting all the money, but I'm still being generous!
You're being too stingy, let's meet in the middle!
Let's meet in the middle and end this game!
You're getting close to the middle, but I want a bit more!
You're pushing me to the limit, but I'll give you a bit more!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! Time to take a bigger cut!
I'm not getting desperate, just strategic!
You're playing a long game, but I'm not going to fall for it!
Time's running out, let's make a deal!
It's now or never, take it or leave it!
